description: Healthcare building templates - medical clinics, dental surgeries, aged care facilities, and pharmacies with comprehensive measurement assumptions and productivity standards

templates.name: Small Medical Clinic
templates.description: Single storey small medical clinic, 150m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces of external walls. Includes consulting rooms, waiting area, reception, toilets, cleaners room, and utility. Excludes external plant rooms. Measured per NCC Class 9a requirements.

typical_layout.toilets: 20m² (2 patient + 1 accessible + 1 staff, total 4 WC + 4 basins)

measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Small medical clinic supports 2-3 GPs with 2 consulting rooms. NCC Class 9a healthcare facility requirements: minimum 2.7m ceiling height in patient rooms (NCC Part F5). Toilet provision = 1 WC per 30m² healthcare area (5 fixtures minimum including 1 accessible). Medical-grade vinyl flooring throughout clinical areas. Consulting rooms sized for examination couch (2.0m × 0.6m) + desk + sink. Waiting area allows 1.5m² per person (capacity ~23 persons).

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 2 consulting rooms for 150m² clinic (supports 2-3 GPs). Not linearly scalable - depends on practice size.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 rooms × 10.5m² each = 21m² clinical space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 WC per 30m² healthcare standard (commercial). 150m² ÷ 30 = 5 fixtures minimum. Includes 1 accessible WC.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 150m² ÷ 30m² = 5 WC + 5 basins (2 patient + 1 accessible + 1 staff + 1 unisex)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 hand basin per consulting room (infection control requirement) + waiting area station.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 consulting rooms × 1 basin + 1 waiting area = 3 clinical basins (separate from toilet basins)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 2-3 emergency power circuits per consulting room + 1 waiting area circuit.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 consulting rooms × 3 outlets + waiting area = 7 emergency circuits minimum

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 sharps container per consulting room + 1 clinical waste bin per room.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 consulting rooms = 2 sharps + 2 clinical waste stations

internal_wall_framing.formula: Internal Walls = √(GFA × 4) × 0.6 (partition factor) × Ceiling Height × 2 faces

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (all areas receive medical-grade vinyl)
flooring.notes: Medical-grade vinyl required for infection control (AS 3740 compliant). Sealed edges to 100mm cove base.

ceiling.notes: NCC requires 2.7m minimum ceiling height for patient rooms. Acoustic plasterboard for consulting rooms.

power_points.notes: Healthcare requires higher power density: consulting rooms (6 outlets per room), waiting area (12 outlets), staff areas (10 outlets), reception (15 outlets). Includes emergency power circuits.

light_points.notes: Emergency lighting required for egress paths, toilets, consulting rooms (NCC Part E4.2). Examination lights in consulting rooms (2 adjustable task lights).

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 150m² ÷ 30 = 5 WC fixtures + 5 basins (toilets) + 3 clinical hand basins = 13 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.waste_applied: Plumbing pipe 1.05 (5% waste) for rough-in routing
plumbing_fixtures.notes: BCA requires 1 accessible WC per healthcare facility. Clinical hand basins separate from toilet basins for infection control.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 50L per consulting room + 25L per staff area
hot_water_system.calculation: 2 consulting rooms × 50L + 25L staff = 125L minimum instantaneous system
hot_water_system.notes: Medical facilities require instant hot water for hand washing. Tempering valve required (50°C maximum delivery).

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Reception/Admin stations + Consulting rooms
data_comms_points.calculation: Reception 4 points + 2 consulting rooms × 2 = 8 data points minimum
data_comms_points.notes: Medical software requires networked systems. Cat6A minimum for telehealth capability.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 84.9m² ÷ 7.44 m²/day = 11.4 person-days brickwork, ÷ 2 = 5.7 days (3-person gang). Rendering: 84.9m² × 2 faces = 169.8m² ÷ 20 m²/day = 8.5 days (2-person gang).
masonry_rendered.adjustment_factors: Access restrictions for operating medical precinct: -5% productivity. Dust control measures required.

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 87.3m² ÷ 2.5 m²/day = 34.9 days (1 carpenter) or 17.5 days (2-person team)

flooring_medical_vinyl.adjustment_factors: Cove base installation (100mm height) reduces productivity by 10%. Infection control sealing required.

painting_interior.derivation: Wall area ~200m² + ceiling 157.5m² = 357.5m² ÷ 2.5 m²/hr = 143 hours × 0.95 = 136 hours = 17 days (1 painter) or 8.5 days (2 painters)
painting_interior.adjustment_factors: Medical-grade low-VOC paint requires 3 coats (vs 2 standard): -5% productivity

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 49 power points × 0.4 hrs = 19.6 hrs; 33 light points × 0.7 hrs = 23.1 hrs; 8 data points × 0.5 hrs = 4 hrs; emergency circuits 6 hrs; total ~53 hours
electrical_installation.second_fix_final: 49 outlets × 0.3 hrs = 14.7 hrs; switches/testing 12 hrs; total ~27 hours
electrical_installation.derivation: 80 hours × 1.10 = 88 hours labour ÷ 8 hrs/day = 11 days (1 electrician + apprentice)
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: Medical electrical compliance testing adds 10%. Emergency lighting testing required.

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 5 WC suites × 2.5 hrs = 12.5 hrs; 8 basins (toilets + clinical) × 1.8 hrs = 14.4 hrs; hot water system 4 hrs; total fixtures ~31 hours
plumbing_installation.adjustment_factors: Medical-grade tapware with temperature control adds 15%. Clinical hand basins require separate rough-in.

hvac_mechanical.adjustment_factors: Medical facilities require HEPA filtration and zone isolation (consulting rooms separate zones): +20% complexity

templates.name: Medium Medical Clinic
templates.description: Single storey medium medical clinic, 250m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces of external walls. Includes 4 consulting rooms, waiting area, reception, treatment room, staff facilities, toilets, and storage. NCC Class 9a healthcare facility.

typical_layout.toilets: 28m² (3 patient + 2 accessible + 1 staff, total 6 WC + 7 basins)

measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Medium medical clinic supports 4-6 GPs with 4 consulting rooms + treatment room for minor procedures. NCC Class 9a requirements: 2.7m ceiling height minimum in patient areas. Toilet provision = 1 WC per 30m² (250m² ÷ 30 = 8.3, provided 9 fixtures including 2 accessible). Treatment room sized for procedure bed + equipment trolley + 1.2m circulation. Waiting area 1.5m² per person (capacity ~37 persons).

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 4 consulting rooms for 250m² clinic (supports 4-6 GPs). Procedure room adds specialized capability.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 4 rooms × 10.5m² + 1 treatment room 15m² = 57m² clinical space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 WC per 30m² healthcare standard. 250m² ÷ 30 = 8.3, provided 9 fixtures (includes 2 accessible).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 250m² ÷ 30m² = 9 WC + 9 basins (3 patient + 2 accessible + 1 staff + 3 unisex)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 hand basin per consulting room + treatment room + waiting area.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 4 consulting + 1 treatment + 1 waiting = 6 clinical basins (separate from toilet basins)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 autoclave station in treatment room for instrument sterilization.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Treatment room requires medical autoclave + benching for sterile instruments

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 emergency trolley, 1 defibrillator, oxygen supply to treatment room.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Treatment room capability requires emergency response equipment

internal_wall_framing.formula: Internal Walls = √(GFA × 4) × 0.65 (partition factor) × Ceiling Height × 2 faces

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (medical-grade vinyl throughout)
flooring.notes: Medical-grade vinyl with 100mm cove base for infection control. AS 3740 compliant.

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in consulting rooms and treatment room. 2.7m minimum height per NCC.

power_points.notes: Treatment room requires 10 power outlets (equipment), consulting rooms 6-8 outlets each, waiting area 15 outlets.

light_points.notes: Treatment room requires examination light (surgical-grade). Emergency lighting for all egress and clinical areas.

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 250m² ÷ 30 = 8.3 → 9 WC fixtures + 9 basins (toilets) + 6 clinical basins = 24 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Treatment room includes instrument wash-down sink. Clinical basins have hands-free operation.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 50L per consulting room + 75L treatment room + 35L staff
hot_water_system.notes: Treatment room requires higher capacity for instrument cleaning. Tempering valve 50°C maximum.

medical_gas_outlets.formula: Oxygen outlets in treatment room only (not full medical gas system)
medical_gas_outlets.notes: Minor procedure capability. Full medical gas reticulation not required for clinic (AS 2896).

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Reception stations + Consulting rooms + Treatment room
data_comms_points.calculation: Reception 5 points + 4 consulting × 2 + treatment 3 = 16 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Practice management software, telehealth, digital imaging require networked infrastructure.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 109.6m² ÷ 7.44 = 14.7 person-days, ÷ 2 = 7.4 days (3-person gang). Rendering: 109.6m² × 2 = 219.2m² ÷ 20 = 11.0 days (2-person gang).

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 122.3m² ÷ 2.5 = 48.9 days (1 carpenter) or 24.5 days (2-person team)

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~340m² + ceiling 262.5m² = 602.5m² ÷ 2.5 = 241 hours × 0.95 = 229 hours = 14.3 days (2 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 85 power × 0.4 hrs + 54 lights × 0.7 hrs + 16 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency 10 hrs = 90 hours

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 9 WC × 2.5 hrs + 15 basins × 1.8 hrs + hot water 5 hrs = 54.5 hours

hvac_mechanical.system_type: 3-4 zone split system with medical filtration

templates.name: Large Medical Clinic
templates.description: Single storey large medical clinic, 500m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces. Comprehensive medical facility with 8 consulting rooms, pathology collection, imaging room, procedure room, staff facilities, and support areas. NCC Class 9a.

typical_layout.toilets: 45m² (5 patient + 3 accessible + 2 staff, total 10 WC + 12 basins)

measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Large medical clinic supports 8-12 GPs with 8 consulting rooms, pathology collection, and imaging capability. NCC Class 9a: 2.7m ceiling height in patient areas. Toilet provision = 1 WC per 30m² (500m² ÷ 30 = 16.7, provided 17 fixtures including 3 accessible). Procedure room sized for minor surgery/biopsy. Imaging room has lead-lined walls (X-ray protection). Waiting area 1.5m² per person (capacity ~60 persons).

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 8 consulting rooms for 500m² clinic (supports 8-12 GPs rotating schedule).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 8 rooms × 10.5m² = 84m² clinical consulting space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 WC per 30m² healthcare standard. 500m² ÷ 30 = 16.7, provided 17 fixtures (includes 3 accessible).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 500m² ÷ 30m² = 17 WC + 17 basins total

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 per consulting room + procedure + pathology + imaging + nurse station.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 8 consulting + 1 procedure + 1 pathology + 1 imaging + 1 nurse = 12 clinical basins

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Lead-lined walls (2mm lead equivalent) for radiation protection. Not scalable with GFA.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 imaging room 18m² × 2.7m height = 48.6m² wall area requiring lead lining

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 medical-grade refrigerator for specimen storage (4°C).
nonlinear_items.derivation: Pathology collection requires dedicated refrigeration unit

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 2 emergency trolleys, 2 defibrillators, oxygen supply to procedure room + imaging room.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Large facility requires multiple emergency response stations

external_wall_area.notes: Imaging room walls require additional lead lining (2mm lead sheet) = 48.6m² × lead cost.

internal_wall_framing.formula: Internal Walls = √(GFA × 4) × 0.7 (partition factor) × Ceiling Height × 2 faces
internal_wall_framing.notes: Imaging room walls: additional 2mm lead sheet attached to studs (48.6m² lead installation).

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (medical-grade vinyl throughout)
flooring.notes: Medical-grade vinyl with 100mm cove base. Pathology area requires anti-slip grade.

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in all consulting rooms, procedure room, and imaging room. 2.7m height per NCC.

power_points.notes: Procedure room 12 outlets, imaging room 15 outlets (equipment), consulting rooms 8 each, pathology 8 outlets.

light_points.notes: Procedure room and imaging room require specialized examination lighting (surgical-grade). Emergency lighting throughout.

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 500m² ÷ 30 = 16.7 → 17 WC fixtures + 17 basins (toilets) + 12 clinical basins = 46 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Procedure room includes scrub sink. Pathology has specimen wash-down sink. Clinical basins hands-free.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 50L per consulting room + 75L procedure + 50L pathology + 40L staff
hot_water_system.notes: Large capacity instantaneous system with recirculation loop. Tempering valve 50°C.

medical_gas_outlets.formula: Oxygen outlets in procedure room + imaging room
medical_gas_outlets.notes: Minor procedure capability. Not full medical gas reticulation (AS 2896).

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Reception + Consulting + Procedure + Imaging + Pathology + Nurse station
data_comms_points.calculation: Reception 8 points + 8 consulting × 2 + procedure 4 + imaging 6 + pathology 4 + nurse 3 = 41 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Imaging room requires dedicated network for PACS (Picture Archiving). Telehealth capability.

lead_radiation_shielding.formula: Lead Sheet Area = Imaging Room Wall Area
lead_radiation_shielding.calculation: Imaging room 18m² × perimeter ~17m × 2.7m = 45.9m² wall area requiring 2mm lead lining
lead_radiation_shielding.notes: X-ray protection per AS/NZS 4543.1 Radiation Protection in Diagnostic and Interventional Radiology.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 155.1m² ÷ 7.44 = 20.8 person-days, ÷ 2 = 10.4 days (3-person gang). Rendering: 155.1m² × 2 = 310.2m² ÷ 20 = 15.5 days (2-person gang).

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 185.9m² ÷ 2.5 = 74.4 days (1 carpenter) or 37.2 days (2-person team)

lead_lining_installation.derivation: Lead lining 45.9m² ÷ 10 m²/day = 4.6 days (2-person specialist team)
lead_lining_installation.adjustment_factors: Lead sheet installation requires certification and specialist labour (not standard carpentry)

flooring_medical_vinyl.derivation: Flooring 575m² ÷ 27.5 × 0.90 = 23.7 days (2-specialist team) or 11.9 days effective

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~680m² + ceiling 525m² = 1205m² ÷ 2.5 = 482 hours × 0.95 = 458 hours = 19.1 days (3 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 175 power × 0.4 hrs + 104 lights × 0.7 hrs + 41 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency 20 hrs = 163.3 hours
electrical_installation.derivation: 245.8 hours × 1.15 = 282.7 hours ÷ 8 = 35.3 days (2 electricians + apprentice) = 17.7 days effective
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: Medical compliance + imaging room electrical isolation: +15%

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 17 WC × 2.5 hrs + 29 basins × 1.8 hrs + hot water 8 hrs = 102.7 hours
plumbing_installation.derivation: 190.7 hours × 1.15 = 219.3 hours ÷ 8 = 27.4 days (2 plumbers + apprentice) = 13.7 days effective

hvac_mechanical.system_type: 6-8 zone split system with medical filtration + imaging room dedicated unit
hvac_mechanical.derivation: 80 hours × 1.25 = 100 hours ÷ 8 = 12.5 days (2 techs + assistant) = 6.3 days effective
hvac_mechanical.adjustment_factors: HEPA filtration + imaging room separate system (positive pressure): +25%

templates.name: Small Dental Surgery
templates.description: Single storey small dental surgery, 120m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces. Dental surgery with 2 treatment rooms, sterilization area, waiting room, and support facilities. NCC Class 9a healthcare.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Small dental surgery supports 2 dentists with 2 treatment rooms. NCC Class 9a: 2.7m ceiling height in patient areas. Dental surgeries require specialized vacuum systems, compressed air, and water supply to each chair. Sterilization room critical for instrument processing (autoclave + ultrasonic cleaner). Toilet provision = 1 WC per 30m² (120m² ÷ 30 = 4, provided 4 fixtures including staff). Treatment rooms sized for dental chair (1.8m × 1.6m) + assistant zone + equipment.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 2 treatment rooms for 120m² surgery (supports 2 dentists).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 rooms × 12m² = 24m² clinical space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 central vacuum pump serving 2 chairs. Not scalable - fixed installation.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 vacuum system with 2 outlet points (1 per chair)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 compressor serving 2 chairs for dental tools.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 air compressor with 2 outlet points

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 autoclave (Class B) + 1 ultrasonic cleaner in sterilization room.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Standard small practice sterilization setup

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 panoramic X-ray unit if included (lead-lined room). Optional for small practice.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Not included in base template (specialist fitout)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 amalgam separator required by environmental regulations (mercury waste).
nonlinear_items.derivation: Mandatory for dental practices using amalgam fillings

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (medical-grade vinyl throughout)
flooring.notes: Medical-grade vinyl with 100mm cove base. Anti-slip grade in sterilization room.

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in treatment rooms. 2.7m height per NCC Class 9a.

power_points.formula: Power Points = (GFA ÷ 4m²) × 1.5 (dental higher density for equipment)
power_points.notes: Treatment rooms require 12 outlets each (dental chair, lights, equipment). Sterilization room 8 outlets.

light_points.notes: Dental operating lights (2 adjustable lights per treatment room, separate from fixed ceiling lights). Emergency lighting for egress.

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 120m² ÷ 30 = 4 WC + 4 basins (toilets) + 2 clinical basins + 2 dental spittoons = 12 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Dental spittoons (cuspidor bowls) integrated into chairs. Clinical basins for hand washing.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 40L per treatment room + 30L sterilization + 20L staff
hot_water_system.notes: Sterilization room requires high-temperature water. Tempering valve 50°C for hand basins.

dental_vacuum_system.notes: Dry vacuum system preferred (lower maintenance). Noise-isolated plant room or external location.

compressed_air_system.notes: Oil-free compressor required for dental use. Pressure regulator at each chair (80-100 psi).

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Reception + Treatment rooms + Dentist office
data_comms_points.calculation: Reception 4 points + 2 treatment × 2 + dentist 2 = 10 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Practice management software, digital X-ray integration, intraoral cameras.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 76.0m² ÷ 7.44 = 10.2 person-days, ÷ 2 = 5.1 days (3-person gang). Rendering: 76.0m² × 2 = 152m² ÷ 20 = 7.6 days.

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 71.3m² ÷ 2.5 = 28.5 days (1 carpenter) or 14.3 days (2-person team)

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~280m² + ceiling 126m² = 406m² ÷ 2.5 = 162 hours × 0.95 = 154 hours = 9.6 days (2 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 45 power × 0.4 hrs + 26 lights × 0.7 hrs + 10 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency 6 hrs = 49.2 hours

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 4 WC × 2.5 hrs + 8 basins/spittoons × 1.8 hrs + hot water 4 hrs + vacuum/air systems 12 hrs = 38.4 hours
plumbing_installation.adjustment_factors: Dental vacuum and compressed air systems: +20%

dental_equipment_installation.installation_time: 2 dental chairs × 8 hrs + sterilization setup 6 hrs + vacuum/air connection 4 hrs = 26 hours

templates.name: Medium Dental Surgery
templates.description: Single storey medium dental surgery, 200m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces. Medium dental surgery with 4 treatment rooms, OPG imaging room, sterilization area, waiting room, and comprehensive support facilities. NCC Class 9a.

typical_layout.toilets: 22m² (3 patient + 1 accessible + 1 staff, total 5 WC + 5 basins)

measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Medium dental surgery supports 4 dentists with 4 treatment rooms + OPG panoramic X-ray. NCC Class 9a: 2.7m ceiling height. OPG room requires lead-lined walls (1.5mm lead equivalent for panoramic X-ray). Dental vacuum system (1 central pump serving 4 chairs), compressed air system (1 compressor), and water supply to each chair. Sterilization room sized for Class B autoclave + ultrasonic cleaner + washer-disinfector. Toilet provision = 1 WC per 30m² (200m² ÷ 30 = 6.7, provided 7 fixtures including 1 accessible).

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 4 treatment rooms for 200m² surgery (supports 4 dentists).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 4 rooms × 12m² = 48m² clinical space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 panoramic X-ray unit (OPG) with lead-lined walls. Medium practice includes imaging capability.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 OPG room 10m² with 1.5mm lead lining on walls

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 central vacuum pump serving 4 chairs. Fixed installation (not scalable).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 vacuum system with 4 outlet points

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 compressor serving 4 chairs.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 air compressor with 4 outlet points

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 Class B autoclave + 1 ultrasonic cleaner + 1 washer-disinfector.
nonlinear_items.derivation: Medium practice sterilization suite for 4 dentists

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 amalgam separator (environmental requirement).
nonlinear_items.derivation: Mandatory for practices using amalgam

internal_wall_framing.notes: OPG room walls require 1.5mm lead sheet lining (perimeter ~12m × 2.7m = 32.4m² lead area).

flooring.notes: Anti-slip grade in sterilization room. Medical-grade with 100mm cove base.

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in treatment rooms and OPG room. 2.7m height per NCC.

power_points.notes: Treatment rooms 12 outlets each (48 total), OPG room 8 outlets, sterilization 10 outlets.

light_points.notes: Dental operating lights (4 adjustable lights, 2 per treatment room). Emergency lighting for egress.

plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 200m² ÷ 30 = 6.7 → 7 WC + 7 basins (toilets) + 4 clinical basins + 4 spittoons = 22 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Dental spittoons integrated into chairs. Sterilization room has dedicated wash-down sink.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 40L per treatment room + 50L sterilization + 25L staff
hot_water_system.notes: Sterilization requires high-temperature water. Tempering valve 50°C for hand basins.

dental_vacuum_system.notes: Dry vacuum system. External or plant room location (noise isolation).

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Reception + Treatment rooms + OPG + Dentist office
data_comms_points.calculation: Reception 5 points + 4 treatment × 2 + OPG 3 + dentist 2 = 18 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Digital X-ray (OPG) requires network integration. Practice management software.

lead_radiation_shielding.formula: Lead Sheet Area = OPG Room Wall Area
lead_radiation_shielding.calculation: OPG room perimeter ~13m × 2.7m = 35.1m² requiring 1.5mm lead lining
lead_radiation_shielding.notes: Panoramic X-ray protection per AS/NZS 4543.1. 1.5mm lead equivalent for OPG.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 98.1m² ÷ 7.44 = 13.2 person-days, ÷ 2 = 6.6 days. Rendering: 98.1m² × 2 = 196.2m² ÷ 20 = 9.8 days.

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 101.0m² ÷ 2.5 = 40.4 days (1 carpenter) or 20.2 days (2-person team)

lead_lining_installation.adjustment_factors: OPG room lead lining requires specialist certification

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~460m² + ceiling 210m² = 670m² ÷ 2.5 = 268 hours × 0.95 = 255 hours = 16.0 days (2 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 75 power × 0.4 hrs + 42 lights × 0.7 hrs + 18 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency 8 hrs = 76.4 hours
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: OPG room electrical isolation + medical compliance: +15%

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 7 WC × 2.5 hrs + 15 basins/spittoons × 1.8 hrs + hot water 5 hrs + vacuum/air systems 16 hrs = 65.5 hours

dental_equipment_installation.installation_time: 4 chairs × 8 hrs + OPG unit 12 hrs + sterilization 8 hrs + vacuum/air 6 hrs = 58 hours

templates.name: Small Aged Care Facility
templates.description: Multi-storey small aged care facility, 600m² GFA, cavity brick block, metal roof

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces. Aged care facility (Class 9c) with resident rooms, common areas, staff facilities, and support services. GFA includes all storeys. NCC Class 9c requirements apply.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Small aged care facility for 16 residents (8 per floor). NCC Class 9c: 2.7m ceiling height minimum in resident rooms. Each resident room 15m² includes bed area, wardrobe, ensuite capability or shared bathroom (4m² each). Accessible bathrooms have ceiling hoists. Common areas sized for social activities. Kitchen for meal preparation (not commercial kitchen). Nurse station on each floor for 24-hour care. Circulation includes wide corridors (2.0m minimum) for wheelchair access and emergency egress. Toilet provision = 1 accessible bathroom per 4 residents.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 16 resident rooms (8 per floor). Each room 15m² minimum per aged care standards.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 16 rooms × 15m² = 240m² residential space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 accessible bathroom per 4 residents (7 total: 4 ground floor + 3 first floor).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 16 residents ÷ 4 = 4 bathrooms per floor minimum

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 nurse station per floor (24-hour staffing).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 2 storeys = 2 nurse stations

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Call buttons in every resident room + bathrooms. Central monitoring at nurse stations.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 16 room call points + 7 bathroom call points = 23 call buttons

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 ceiling hoist per 2 accessible bathrooms (mobility assistance).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 7 bathrooms ÷ 2 = 4 ceiling hoists

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 lift required for 2 storeys (NCC accessibility requirement for Class 9c).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 passenger lift (8-person minimum capacity)

external_wall_area.formula: Wall Area = Perimeter × Ceiling Height × Storeys

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (medical-grade vinyl + carpet in resident rooms)
flooring.calculation: 600m² total: 240m² vinyl (clinical areas) + 360m² carpet (resident rooms, common areas)
flooring.notes: Medical-grade vinyl in bathrooms, corridors, nurse stations. Carpet in resident rooms and lounges (comfort and noise reduction).

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in resident rooms. 2.7m height per NCC Class 9c.

power_points.notes: Resident rooms 8 outlets each (128 total), common areas 30 outlets, nurse stations 15 outlets, kitchen 20 outlets.

light_points.notes: Emergency lighting for all egress paths, resident rooms, common areas (NCC Part E4.2). Night lights in corridors.

plumbing_fixtures.formula: Fixtures = Accessible Bathrooms + Staff Toilets + Kitchen
plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 7 accessible bathrooms × 3 fixtures each (WC + basin + shower) + 3 staff WC + 3 staff basins + kitchen sink = 30 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Accessible bathrooms require grab rails, slip-resistant flooring, and emergency call buttons.

hot_water_system.formula: Capacity = 80L per resident + 50L per staff area + 100L kitchen
hot_water_system.notes: Large capacity required for bathing schedule. Solar hot water system typical. Tempering valve 50°C for safety (scald prevention).

emergency_call_system.calculation: 16 resident rooms + 7 bathrooms = 23 call points with central monitoring at 2 nurse stations
emergency_call_system.notes: Nurse call system required by aged care regulations. Audible and visual alerts.

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Staff office + Nurse stations + Kitchen + Activity room
data_comms_points.calculation: Office 4 points + 2 nurse stations × 3 + kitchen 2 + activity 2 = 14 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Electronic medication management system requires network infrastructure.

lift_installation.notes: NCC requires lift for Class 9c aged care facilities over 1 storey. Stretcher-capable preferred.

cavity_brickwork.derivation: External walls 240.2m² ÷ 6.5 m²/day (average) = 37.0 person-days × 0.90 = 33.3 person-days, ÷ 2 = 16.7 days (3-person gang)

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 189.5m² ÷ 2.5 = 75.8 days (1 carpenter) or 37.9 days (2-person team)

floor_structure.derivation: Upper floor 340.2m² × 0.15m depth = 51.0m³ ÷ 15 m³/day = 3.4 days placing

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~1300m² + ceiling 630m² = 1930m² ÷ 2.5 = 772 hours × 0.95 = 733 hours = 30.5 days (3 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 180 power × 0.4 hrs + 125 lights × 0.7 hrs + 14 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency call 30 hrs + lift 12 hrs = 206.5 hours
electrical_installation.derivation: 285.5 hours × 1.15 = 328.3 hours ÷ 8 = 41.0 days (2 electricians + apprentice) = 20.5 days effective
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: Nurse call system installation + aged care compliance: +15%

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 7 accessible bathrooms × 8 hrs (shower + WC + basin + grab rails) + 3 staff WC × 2.5 hrs + kitchen 6 hrs + hot water system 10 hrs = 88.5 hours
plumbing_installation.derivation: 200.5 hours × 1.20 = 240.6 hours ÷ 8 = 30.1 days (2 plumbers + apprentice) = 15.0 days effective
plumbing_installation.adjustment_factors: Accessible bathrooms with grab rails and emergency call integration: +20%

hvac_mechanical.system_type: 8-10 zone split system (resident rooms + common areas)
hvac_mechanical.derivation: 90 hours × 1.10 = 99 hours ÷ 8 = 12.4 days (2 techs + assistant) = 6.2 days effective
hvac_mechanical.adjustment_factors: Multi-storey ductwork + individual room temperature control: +10%

lift_installation.derivation: 100 hours ÷ 8 = 12.5 days (3-person specialist team) = 4.2 days effective

templates.name: Medium Aged Care Facility
templates.description: Multi-storey medium aged care facility, 1200m² GFA, cavity brick block, metal roof

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Healthcare GFA measured from internal faces. Medium aged care facility (Class 9c) with 32 resident rooms across 3 storeys, common areas, commercial kitchen, therapy rooms, and staff facilities. GFA includes all storeys.
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Medium aged care facility for 32 residents (8 ground + 10 first + 14 second floor). NCC Class 9c: 2.7m ceiling height in resident rooms. Each resident room 15m² includes bed area, wardrobe, ensuite or shared accessible bathroom. Ground floor has commercial kitchen for meal preparation and dining for all residents. Activity and therapy rooms support physical and cognitive programs. Nurse station on each floor for 24-hour care. Lift required (NCC). Wide corridors (2.0m minimum) for wheelchair and equipment access. Toilet provision = 1 accessible bathroom per 4-5 residents.

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 32 resident rooms (8 + 10 + 14 distributed across 3 floors).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 32 rooms × 15m² = 480m² residential space

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 accessible bathroom per 4-5 residents (18 total: 5 ground + 6 first + 7 second floor).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 32 residents ÷ 4.5 ≈ 7 bathrooms per level (average)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 commercial kitchen serving 32 residents (3 meals daily). Not scalable - fixed installation.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 40m² kitchen with commercial equipment (ovens, bain-maries, dishwasher)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 nurse station per floor (3 total).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 3 storeys = 3 nurse stations with medication storage

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Call buttons in every resident room + bathrooms.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 32 room call points + 18 bathroom call points = 50 call buttons

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 ceiling hoist per 2 accessible bathrooms.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 18 bathrooms ÷ 2 = 9 ceiling hoists

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 passenger lift (10-person capacity) serving 3 floors.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 lift × 3 stops (ground + first + second)

external_wall_area.formula: Wall Area = Perimeter × Ceiling Height × Storeys

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (vinyl + carpet mix)
flooring.calculation: 1200m² total: 480m² vinyl (clinical, kitchen) + 720m² carpet (resident rooms, common areas)
flooring.notes: Commercial kitchen requires slip-resistant tiles (40m²). Medical-grade vinyl in bathrooms and corridors. Carpet in resident areas.

ceiling.notes: Acoustic plasterboard in resident rooms. Commercial kitchen requires cleanable ceiling (vinyl-faced plasterboard).

power_points.notes: Resident rooms 8 outlets each (256), common areas 60, nurse stations 30, kitchen 50 (commercial appliances).

light_points.notes: Emergency lighting for all egress paths. Night lights in corridors. Kitchen requires commercial lighting.

plumbing_fixtures.formula: Fixtures = Accessible Bathrooms + Staff Toilets + Kitchen
plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 18 bathrooms × 3 fixtures (WC + basin + shower) + 4 staff WC + 4 basins + kitchen 3-bay sink + dishwasher = 65 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Commercial kitchen requires grease trap. Accessible bathrooms have grab rails.

hot_water_system.notes: Large solar hot water system with gas booster. Tempering valve 50°C. Recirculation loop for instant delivery.

emergency_call_system.calculation: 32 rooms + 18 bathrooms = 50 call points with monitoring at 3 nurse stations
emergency_call_system.notes: Nurse call system with mobile staff paging. Audible and visual alerts.

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Office + Nurse stations + Kitchen + Activity rooms
data_comms_points.calculation: Office 5 points + 3 nurse stations × 3 + kitchen 3 + activity 4 = 21 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Electronic medication management and resident care software.

lift_installation.notes: Stretcher-capable lift required for emergency evacuation (NCC Class 9c).

cavity_brickwork.derivation: External walls 416.0m² ÷ 6.5 m²/day × 0.85 = 54.5 person-days, ÷ 3 = 18.2 days (5-person gang)
cavity_brickwork.adjustment_factors: Three storey scaffolding and material hoisting: -15%

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 288.1m² ÷ 2.5 × 0.95 = 109.5 days (1 carpenter) or 36.5 days (3-person team)

flooring_vinyl_carpet_tiles.derivation: Vinyl 552m² ÷ 27.5 × 0.90 = 22.7 days; Carpet 828m² ÷ 35 = 23.7 days; Tiles 40m² ÷ 20 = 2.0 days
flooring_vinyl_carpet_tiles.adjustment_factors: Three storey material transport and access: -10%

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~2600m² + ceiling 1260m² = 3860m² ÷ 2.5 = 1544 hours × 0.95 = 1467 hours = 45.8 days (4 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 375 power × 0.4 hrs + 250 lights × 0.7 hrs + 21 data × 0.5 hrs + emergency call 60 hrs + lift 18 hrs = 413.5 hours
electrical_installation.derivation: 571 hours × 1.15 = 656.7 hours ÷ 8 = 82.1 days (3 elec + 2 appr) = 27.4 days effective
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: Nurse call system + aged care compliance: +15%

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 18 bathrooms × 8 hrs + 4 staff WC × 2.5 hrs + kitchen 20 hrs (commercial) + hot water 15 hrs + grease trap 6 hrs = 205 hours
plumbing_installation.derivation: 425 hours × 1.20 = 510 hours ÷ 8 = 63.8 days (3 plumbers + 2 appr) = 21.3 days effective
plumbing_installation.adjustment_factors: Accessible bathrooms + commercial kitchen + grease trap: +20%

hvac_mechanical.system_type: 16-20 zone VRV system (resident rooms + common areas + kitchen)
hvac_mechanical.derivation: 180 hours × 1.15 = 207 hours ÷ 8 = 25.9 days (3 techs + 2 asst) = 8.6 days effective

lift_installation.adjustment_factors: Stretcher-capable lift with emergency evacuation capability

templates.name: Pharmacy
templates.description: Single storey pharmacy, 120m² GFA, rendered masonry, metal roof, slab on ground

measurement_assumptions.gfa_definition: Retail GFA measured from internal faces. Pharmacy includes retail area, dispensary, consultation room, and storage. Typically located in shopping centre or medical precinct. NCC Class 6 (retail) with Class 9a elements (consultation room).
measurement_assumptions.derivation_notes: Pharmacy 120m² includes retail sales area (over-the-counter products), secure dispensary area (prescription medications), private consultation room (medication reviews, vaccinations), and storage (excess stock, refrigerated medications). NCC Class 6 retail with healthcare elements: 2.7m ceiling height for professional appearance. Dispensary requires security barriers and controlled access (TGA requirements). Consultation room provides patient privacy (similar to medical clinic consulting room). Refrigeration required for temperature-sensitive medications (2-8°C storage). Toilet provision = 1 WC minimum (staff + customer).

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Fixed dispensary size (25m²) regardless of total GFA. Security and workflow requirements dictate layout.
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 dispensary 25m² with secure medication storage and dispensing workbenches

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 consultation room for patient privacy (medication reviews, vaccinations, health checks).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 consultation room 10m² (similar to medical consulting room)

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 medical-grade refrigerator (2-8°C) for temperature-sensitive medications (vaccines, insulin, biologics).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 refrigerator (lockable, temperature-monitored) in dispensary

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: 1 narcotic safe for Schedule 8 controlled drugs (TGA requirement).
nonlinear_items.derivation: 1 safe (Class 3 security rating) in dispensary

nonlinear_items.scaling_rule: Security screens/barriers between dispensary and retail area (TGA requirement).
nonlinear_items.derivation: Approximately 6m of security screening (countertop height 1.1m)

internal_wall_framing.notes: Dispensary partition walls include security barrier integration (additional cost not in framing).

flooring.formula: Floor Finish Area = GFA (commercial vinyl in dispensary + carpet tiles in retail)
flooring.calculation: 120m² total: 45m² vinyl (dispensary, consultation, staff) + 75m² carpet tiles (retail sales area)
flooring.notes: Dispensary requires easy-clean vinyl flooring. Retail area carpet tiles for comfort and noise reduction.

ceiling.notes: Suspended ceiling in retail area (lighting integration). 2.7m height for professional appearance.

power_points.notes: Dispensary requires 15 outlets (computers, refrigerator, equipment). Retail area 12 outlets. Consultation room 6 outlets.

light_points.notes: Retail area requires good lighting (product visibility). Dispensary task lighting for prescription reading. Emergency lighting for egress.

plumbing_fixtures.formula: Fixtures = Staff Toilet + Dispensary Hand Basin
plumbing_fixtures.calculation: 1 WC + 1 basin (toilet) + 1 hand basin (dispensary) = 3 total fixtures
plumbing_fixtures.notes: Dispensary hand basin for hand hygiene (medication handling). Staff toilet accessible from back-of-house.

hot_water_system.notes: Small capacity for hand washing only. Tempering valve 50°C.

data_comms_points.formula: Data Points = Dispensary workstations + POS + Consultation room
data_comms_points.calculation: Dispensary 5 points (computers, printers) + retail POS 3 points + consultation 1 point = 9 data points
data_comms_points.notes: Pharmacy dispensing software requires networked computers. Electronic prescription integration (eRx).

security_alarm_system.formula: Security system with motion sensors + door/window contacts
security_alarm_system.calculation: 1 alarm panel + 4 motion sensors + 6 door/window contacts
security_alarm_system.notes: TGA requires security systems for pharmacies (Schedule 4 and 8 drug storage). CCTV recommended.

dispensary_fitout.formula: Dispensary benching + security barrier + medication storage
dispensary_fitout.notes: Specialist pharmacy fitout (not standard construction). Security barrier between dispensary and retail.

masonry_rendered.derivation: External walls 76.0m² ÷ 7.44 = 10.2 person-days, ÷ 2 = 5.1 days. Rendering: 76.0m² × 2 = 152m² ÷ 20 = 7.6 days.

internal_wall_framing.derivation: Internal walls 65.0m² ÷ 2.5 = 26.0 days (1 carpenter) or 13.0 days (2-person team)

painting_interior.derivation: Wall ~280m² + ceiling 126m² = 406m² ÷ 2.5 = 162 hours = 20.3 hours per painter = 10.1 days (2 painters)

electrical_installation.first_fix_roughin: 39 power × 0.4 hrs + 24 lights × 0.7 hrs + 9 data × 0.5 hrs + security alarm 8 hrs = 40.9 hours
electrical_installation.adjustment_factors: Dedicated circuit for medication refrigerator + alarm system: +5%

plumbing_installation.fixture_labour: 1 WC × 2.5 hrs + 2 basins × 1.8 hrs + hot water 3 hrs = 9.1 hours

dispensary_fitout.installation_time: 40-50 hours (benching, shelving, security barrier, safe installation)
dispensary_fitout.adjustment_factors: Specialist pharmacy fitout (joinery + security integration) separate from standard construction
